about_the_game:
Why should the spirits haunting Yeondu High School have all the fun? Equip the Horror Costume Set to kit out the janitors with nightmarish outfits – and don the students with survival uniforms. Trick or treat? Treat, most definitely.

This DLC unlocks the Horror costume for Dal-Su Son.
detailed_description:
Why should the spirits haunting Yeondu High School have all the fun? Equip the Horror Costume Set to kit out the janitors with nightmarish outfits – and don the students with survival uniforms. Trick or treat? Treat, most definitely.

This DLC unlocks the Horror costume for Dal-Su Son.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800GTS or better, AMD Radeon HD 3830
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
